title: How long should a novel summary be? - Quora

response.answer_text: You know when you read the back of a book and it sounds so good you just HAVE to read it? That is a novel summary. That is a perfect example of how long it should be: a single page. Max.
One paragraph or two is fine. If you write it long, you can risk spoiling your story or boring your readers. You should stick to the point so your readers will get hooked.
